Hi. I'm Ruth Andinda.

A Ugandan Software developer and database designer, I develop cross-platform mobile desktop and web applications with latest techinologies in programming and Design distributed and well perfomant Databases.

Learn about what I do

Here's all the stuff I do.

I specialize in the following areas.

Database design

Am a professional database designer of both relational like MySQL, SQL server, SQLite and Oracle and non-relational databese like MongoDb.

Database Administration

Database administration work include perfomance tuning, SQL tweaking, paging and others

Web development

A web developer conversant with mordern web development technologies including backend technologies such as php, laravel, Nodejs, python.
